content.prompt: Which of the following developments during the mid-to-late 1910s could best be used as evidence to refute the argument made in the excerpt?

choices.label: The economic situation of many African Americans in urban areas improved.
The number of African Americans working as sharecroppers remained consistent.
The movement for African American civil rights advanced through new legislation.
The settlement houses gave African Americans opportunities to learn new skills.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
